## About me {.central}

I am a Postodctoral Researcher of Statistical Science at the [department of Economics, Management and Statistics](https://www.dems.unimib.it/en) (DEMS) of [University of Milano-Bicocca](https://en.unimib.it).

[**Research interests**]{.blue}: Bayesian clustering; Bayesian nonparametrics; random partition models; applied Bayesian models; computational statistics; topic models.

[**E-mail**]{.blue}: alice.giampino\@unimib.it
